job_description:
Animation Production Coordinator

Prayan Animation Studio (P) Ltd is seeking an experienced Animation Production Coordinator to support the execution of animated projects from pre-production through delivery.

Location: E-12, Tejaswini-1, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India, 695 581 Website: http://www.prayananimation.com

Closing Date: 22, Sept 2025 Job Published: 03, Sept 2025

Contact Email: jobs@prayananimation.com

Key Responsibilities:

  • Coordinate daily production activities across multiple departments (illustration, storyboard, layout, design, animation, compositing, etc.).
  • Plan and track project progress, update schedules, and flag risks to ensure deadlines are met.
  • Attend client calls and understand the project inside out.
  • Maintain clear communication between artists, supervisors, and production management.
  • Prepare and distribute production reports, meeting notes, and task lists.
  • Assist in resource planning—managing assignments, deadlines, and approvals.
  • Support the Production Manager in organizing reviews, dailies, and deliveries.
  • Ensure assets, files, and documentation are properly named, stored, and delivered.
  • Anticipate potential workflow or pipeline issues and propose solutions.
  • Serve as a point of contact for external vendors or freelance talent when required.

Qualifications & Skills:

  • Experience: Minimum 3–5 years in animation, 2D, 3D and Books illustration.
  • Strong understanding of the animation/illustration pipeline.
  • Proficient in production tracking tools (e.g., Frame.io, Discord, slack, Excel, Google sheets, or similar).
  • Excellent communication skills (English and Hindi).
  • Excellent organizational and time-management skills with attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills—able to work effectively with both creative and technical teams.
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.
  • Problem-solving mindset and proactive attitude.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have):

  • Experience in 2D animation series or educational animation pipelines.
  • Experience in children’s book and comic book production.
  • Familiarity with industry-standard software (Animate, Toon Boom Harmony, After Effects etc.).

How to Apply:

To apply, please submit your resume to jobs@prayananimation.com. Please put the mail subject as Resume – “Animation Production Coordinator”.
summary: Prayan Animation Studio is hiring an Animation Production Coordinator to manage animation projects from start to finish. They will coordinate teams, track progress, and ensure deadlines are met.

job_title: Investor Relations & Fundraising Manager ( Part Time)
job_description:
Investor Relations & Fundraising Manager (Part-Time)

Reizend (P) Ltd SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 http://www.reizendretail.in

Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Experience: 3+ years preferred in Banking / Wealth Management / Investment Advisory / Fundraising

CTC: 9 LPA

Work Mode: Remote

Job Description

We are seeking a professional with strong experience in banking, wealth management, or investment advisory to drive fundraising initiatives for our technology firm. The role involves connecting with investors, preparing investment pitches, and managing relationships to secure funding for business growth.

Key Responsibilities

  • Identify and connect with potential investors (VCs, HNIs, Family Offices, PE firms).
  • Prepare and present investment pitches, business plans, and financial models.
  • Manage relationships with investors and provide timely updates.
  • Support negotiations and deal structuring for fundraising.
  • Work with leadership to align funding strategy with business goals.

Preferred Skills

  • Graduate/Postgraduate in Finance, Business, or related field.
  • 3+ years’ experience in fundraising, banking, wealth management, or investment sales.

job_description:
Behavioral Scientist (Part-time)

Reizend (P) Ltd SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 http://www.reizendretail.in

Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Closing Date: 18, Oct 2025 Job Published: 03, Sept 2025

Employment Type: Part-time Experience: 3+ years preferred CTC: 4 LPA Work mode: Remote

Brief Description

We are seeking a passionate and analytical Behavioral Scientist to help us understand, predict, and influence human behavior through research-driven interventions. You will apply behavioral science principles to solve complex challenges across domains such as user experience, public health, financial decision-making, or organizational design.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and conduct qualitative and quantitative behavioral research (e.g., surveys, interviews, ethnographic studies, experiments).
  • Identify behavioral biases and drivers that influence decision-making and user actions.
  • Translate insights into actionable strategies, nudges, or interventions that drive measurable outcomes.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with product, design, marketing, and strategy teams to embed behavioral science into solutions.
  • Analyze data using statistical tools and behavioral frameworks.
  • Design and evaluate behavior change interventions, pilots, or randomized control trials (RCTs).
  • Communicate research findings through presentations, reports, and storytelling.

Qualifications:

  • Masters or Ph.D. in Behavioral Science, Psychology, Behavioral Economics, Cognitive Science, Sociology, or a related field.
  • Proven experience applying behavioral science in real-world projects (industry, academic, or consultancy settings).
  • Strong understanding of behavioral theories, models, and experimental design.
  • Proficiency in tools such as SPSS, R, Python, or qualitative research platforms.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
  • Ability to think critically, empathize with users, and simplify complex behaviors.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience working in [industry, e.g., digital health, fintech, public policy, etc.].
  • Familiarity with human-centered design, design thinking, or service design.
  • Published work or case studies in applied behavioral science.
summary: We are seeking a part-time Behavioral Scientist to understand and influence human behavior using research-driven interventions. The role involves designing studies, analyzing data, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

job_description:

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 03, Sept 2025 Contact Email: jobs@yarabltd.co.uk

We are looking for Claims Handlers / Customer Service Executives to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will handle customer queries, process claims, and ensure timely resolution while maintaining the highest standards of service.

UK experience is highly desirable, and prior insurance industry experience is a strong advantage—but not mandatory. We also welcome freshers with excellent communication skills and a willingness to learn.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Handle inbound and outbound calls related to claims and customer service.
  • Assist customers in reporting First Notification of Loss (FNOL) and gathering relevant information.
  • Validate and process claims in line with company guidelines and compliance standards (FCA regulations).
  • Communicate clearly and professionally with customers, service partners, and underwriters.
  • Manage claim updates via email and phone, ensuring timely follow-ups.
  • Maintain accurate records of all interactions in the system.
  • Handle queries, complaints, and escalations effectively, ensuring fair outcomes.

Key Skills & Competencies:

  • Excellent communication skills (verbal and written).
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  • Ability to remain calm under pressure and handle challenging conversations.
  • Basic computer literacy and ability to work with CRM or ticketing systems.
  • Team player with a customer-first attitude.

Preferred Skills

  • Previous experience in UK customer service or claims handling (highly desirable).
  • Insurance experience will be an added advantage.
  • Fresh graduates or candidates with no prior experience are encouraged to apply (full training provided).
summary: Yarab Technologies is seeking Claims Handlers/Customer Service Executives. Responsibilities include handling queries, processing claims, and ensuring customer satisfaction, with opportunities for both experienced professionals and freshers.

job_description:
Senior Digital Marketing Executive

ECS Fin is looking for a creative, data-driven, and globally oriented Senior Digital Marketing Executive for our digital initiatives across global markets including the US, UK, Europe, Middle East, and APAC. As a core member of the growth strategy, the candidate will work closely with product, sales, and design teams.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute integrated digital marketing plans aligned with company goals.
  • Identify target segments in corporate/fintech verticals and tailor campaigns for maximum impact.
  • Strategize and manage B2B marketing campaigns across SEO, SEM, email, display ads, and paid social.
  • Create and optimize lead generation funnels, marketing automation workflows, and nurture sequences.
  • Run performance campaigns across Google Ads, LinkedIn, and programmatic platforms to maximize lead quality and ROI.
  • Optimize website UX, conversion paths, and ensure SEO best practices across content.
  • Monitor and improve key metrics (CTR, CPC, MQLs, bounce rate, etc.) using Google Analytics, Search Console, and campaign dashboards.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create high-impact digital content (blogs, whitepapers, case studies, videos, etc.).
  • Manage and grow ECS Fin’s online presence on LinkedIn, Twitter, and other relevant channels.
  • Track digital trends, markets, tools, and recommend improvements to stay ahead of the curve.

Experience:

  • 3–7 years of proven experience in digital marketing, preferably in B2B software, fintech, or enterprise solutions.
  • Strong exposure to international markets (especially US, UK, Europe, UAE, Malaysia) and global campaign execution.
  • Experience in corporate-level lead generation, not limited to local SEO or small business promotion.
  • Demonstrated ability to design and execute digital strategies that impact the enterprise sales pipeline.

Preferred Skills

  • Solid grasp of SEO (technical + content), SEM/PPC, social media (especially LinkedIn for B2B), and display ads.
  • Hands-on experience with tools such as Google Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, HubSpot, Mailchimp, WordPress, and Google Analytics.
  • Familiarity with marketing automation and CRM integration (HubSpot, Marketo, or similar).
  • Content marketing capabilities – ability to drive messaging for fintech audiences through thought leadership content.
  • Strong analytical mindset with ability to translate data into strategy and action.
  • Proactive, collaborative, and comfortable taking initiative in a fast-moving environment.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills with a flair for positioning technical solutions for business stakeholders.

Contact Information: careers@ecsfin.com

Location: Trivandrum

Company Information: ECS BUSINESS SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd Module No. 422, 423 and 424, Nila Building. 4th Floor, Phase 1 Campus, Technopark. , 695581 https://www.ecsfin.com
summary: ECS Fin is hiring a Senior Digital Marketing Executive to drive digital initiatives across global markets. The role involves developing and executing B2B marketing campaigns and optimizing lead generation funnels.

job_description:
.Net Team Lead

Klystron Technologies Office Nbr:2210, Yamuna Building, Technopark Phase-III , 695583

About Us: Klystron Global is a leading provider of cutting-edge Digital Transformation solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses across various industries. With a focus on innovation and client satisfaction, we are committed to delivering exceptional technology solutions that empower organizations to thrive in the digital era.

Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced and visionary Tech Lead to guide our team of dynamic developers of Self-Service Station Development Team. The Tech Lead will be responsible for the technical direction and successful delivery of our web applications, from architectural design to final deployment. This role involves hands-on development, team mentorship, and strategic planning, covering everything from back-end to client-side code using optimal and efficient technologies, frameworks, and patterns.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Lead a development team in creating integrated ASP.NET applications, providing technical guidance and mentorship.
  • Drive the architectural design and hands-on development of robust, scalable web-based services and applications.
  • Establish and enforce coding guidelines for the ASP.NET development team.
  • Perform rigorous code reviews to ensure quality and provide necessary corrections and feedback.
  • Oversee the development of databases, including queries, triggers, and stored procedures.
  • Collaborate with the quality assurance team to ensure the delivery of high-quality and reliable web applications.
  • Interact with customers and internal stakeholders like Business Analysts to define project features and technical requirements.
  • Research and develop prototypes for complex design challenges.
  • Work collaboratively with the Project Manager to ensure the timely delivery of projects.
  • Monitor application performance post-deployment and implement necessary enhancements.
  • Resolve application defects and issues in a timely manner.
  • Prepare and maintain comprehensive technical documentation as per project standards.

Preferred Skills/Education & Experience:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or a similar field.
  • 5-7+ years of experience in software development, with significant experience in a lead role.
  • Extensive experience with C#, ASP.NET, MVC, WPF, and WCF.
  • Proven prior experience as a Developer is required.
  • In-depth working knowledge of coding using .NET languages.
  • Strong familiarity with the ASP.NET framework and SQL servers.
  • Experience with the design and implementation of controls or data acquisition systems.

Preferred Knowledge & Skills:

  • Excellent interpersonal, presentation, and leadership skills with demonstrated initiative.
  • A keen eye for detail, with a focus on completeness and accuracy.
  • Strong communication skills.
  • A self-starter who can effectively balance priorities between multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Demonstrated ability to meet project budgets and schedules.
  • Ability to work effectively both as an individual contributor and as a collaborative member of a multi-disciplinary team.
  • Willingness to travel up to 50% internationally or domestically.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Ongoing professional development opportunities.
  • A collaborative and innovative work environment.

If you are a motivated and experienced Tech Lead looking for a challenging opportunity to guide a talented team and contribute to the success of a leading technology company, we invite you to apply.

Contact Information: Jobs.in@klystronglobal.com
summary: Klystron Global seeks a .Net Team Lead to guide a development team. The role involves architectural design, hands-on development, and team mentorship for web applications.

job_description:
Comic Artist

Prayan Animation Studio (P) Ltd is seeking a talented and passionate Comic Artist to join our creative team.

Location: E-12, Tejaswini-1, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India, 695 581

Website: http://www.prayananimation.com

Contact Email: jobs@prayananimation.com

Brief Description: The ideal candidate will have strong skills in visual storytelling and a deep understanding of comic book art techniques. Whether you specialize in penciling, inking, coloring, or lettering, you will be an integral part of bringing our narratives to life. The comic artist will work closely with writers, editors, and other team members to produce high-quality comic books, graphic novels, or web comics that captivate readers.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Penciling: Create dynamic, detailed, and expressive line drawings for comic pages, ensuring clear visual storytelling and effective panel composition.
  • Inking: Enhance penciled art with clean, precise lines, adding depth, contrast, and texture to the artwork.
  • Coloring: Apply colors to finished inked pages, maintaining consistency, mood, and tone that complements the story.
  • Lettering: Add dialogue, sound effects, and captions in a visually appealing way, ensuring readability and proper integration with the artwork.
  • Storytelling: Interpret the script and bring the story to life through artwork, ensuring proper pacing, character expressions, and action flow.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with writers, editors, and other team members to ensure the artwork matches the narrative vision and adheres to deadlines.
  • Revisions: Accept feedback and make necessary revisions to artwork to meet editorial or project requirements.
  • Meeting Deadlines: Manage time effectively to ensure the timely delivery of high-quality artwork according to project schedules.
  • Style Consistency: Maintain consistency in style, tone, and artistic quality throughout the project, including character designs, settings, and action sequences.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a comic artist, with a portfolio displaying previous comic book, graphic novel, or web comic work.
  • 5+ years of experience in comic art.
  • Strong drawing and illustration skills.
  • Proficiency in digital art tools (e.g., Photoshop, Clip Studio Paint, Procreate) or traditional media.
  • Knowledge of comic book and print production processes (layouts, paneling, and composition).
  • Understanding of comic book anatomy, perspective, and visual storytelling.
  • Ability to work from scripts and adapt to a variety of art styles.
  • Experience in lettering, coloring and inking is a plus.
  • Experience with character design, environment design or world building.
  • Experience with 2D modeling or digital sculpture.
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Job Type: Full time

Schedule: Day shift

Ability to commute / Relocate: Trivandrum, Kerala: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work.

Education: Fine Art

Experience: 5+ Years

Expected Start Date: At the earliest.

To Apply: Please submit your resume and a link to your online portfolio highlighting your best work to jobs@prayananimation.com. Email Subject Line: Resume – “Comic Artist”

Closing Date: 10, Sept 2025

Job Published: 03, Sept 2025
summary: Prayan Animation Studio is hiring a Comic Artist to create high-quality comic books. The role requires strong drawing skills, proficiency in digital art tools, and experience with visual storytelling.

  • Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.

job_description:
AI/ML Engineer

Storygame (P) Ltd is seeking a highly skilled and innovative AI/ML Engineer with at least 2 years of experience in Large Language Models (LLMs), Generative AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and multimodal AI involving audio and video processing. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience building and integrating cutting-edge AI solutions, fine-tuning open-source and proprietary models, and deploying them into production environments.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and deploy solutions using LLMs (GPT, LLaMA, Mistral, Claude, etc.) for real-world applications.
  • Implement and optimize RAG pipelines combining vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS) with LLMs.
  • Fine-tune transformer-based models using Hugging Face, LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, or similar frameworks.
  • Work with generative AI models for text, image, audio, and video generation (e.g., Stable Diffusion, Whisper, AudioLM, DreamBooth, SDXL, etc.).
  • Design and integrate multimodal systems that can process and generate content across different formats.
  • Deploy models using ONNX, TorchServe, Triton, or custom APIs.
  • Collaborate with DevOps and MLOps teams for model versioning, deployment, and monitoring.
  • Research, prototype, and implement the latest advancements in generative AI and foundation models.
  • Ensure ethical AI practices, model alignment, and bias mitigation.
  • Optimize models for performance, latency, and resource efficiency.

Nice to Have:

  • Experience with AutoGPT, Agentic AI systems, or LangGraph.
  • Knowledge of RLHF, alignment training, and custom dataset curation.
  • Exposure to MLOps tools like MLflow, Weights & Biases, or Kubeflow.
  • Contribution to open-source AI projects or publications in relevant areas.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of hands-on experience in AI/ML engineering.
  • Proficient with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and ML libraries (e.g., Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI, etc.).
  • Strong understanding of LLMs, tokenization, attention mechanisms, and transformer architectures.
  • Experience with fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and in-context learning.
  • Knowledge of vector databases, embeddings, and RAG-based architectures.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and scalable AI infrastructure.
  • Experience working with Docker, Kubernetes, and GPU optimization.
  • Solid grasp of audio and video processing models.
  • Passion for innovation and staying updated with the latest research and trends.

Contact Information:

  • Email: jincy.storygame@gmail.com
  • Address: Ground floor, Tejaswini building, Technopark Phase 1 Kazakootam trivandrum kerala , 695581
  • Website: https://storygame.io

Closing Date: 04, Sept 2025 Job Published: 02, Sept 2025
summary: We are looking for an AI/ML Engineer to innovate and deploy AI solutions, with a focus on LLMs and Generative AI. This role involves fine-tuning models, optimizing performance, and ensuring ethical AI practices.

job_description:
Apprenticeship Opportunity at Electronics Technology Parks Kerala (Technopark)

Electronics Technology Parks Kerala (Technopark) is seeking talented and driven graduates for paid apprenticeships at Park Centre, Technopark. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in Electronics and Communication.

Key Details:

  • Location: Park Centre, Technopark Campus, Trivandrum (695581)
  • Contract Duration: 1 year
  • Contact Email: apprenticeship@technopark.in
  • Closing Date: 08, Sept 2025
  • Job Published: 02, Sept 2025

  • Diploma in Electronics and Communication, Electrical and Electronics, Electronics & Instrumentation, and Applied Electronics (pass out from 2021 onwards).
  • Ability to communicate clearly and consistently.
  • Natural interest in working with people.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Monitor and operate the CCTV surveillance system from the Control Room on a continuous basis.
  • Perform live monitoring of all access points, perimeters, and critical areas within the Technopark campus to ensure security and safety.
  • Log and report any suspicious activity, unauthorized access, or system anomalies to the concerned authority immediately.
  • Register and respond to grievances and complaints received in the Control Room; coordinate follow-up actions as necessary.
  • Maintain clear and accurate records of incidents, system faults, or maintenance needs in the Control Room logbook.
  • Assist AMC technicians or authorized service personnel with on-ground support, system checks, or troubleshooting as required.
  • Ensure proper functioning of all surveillance equipment and report any technical issues or malfunctions without delay.
  • Adhere to Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and always maintain confidentiality and data security.
  • Maintain cleanliness and operational readiness of the Control Room environment.

Preferred Skills:

  • Ability to work in rotating 8-hour shifts.

  • Morning Shift: 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM

  • Afternoon Shift: 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM
  • Night Shift: 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM

Stipend:

  • Rs. 12,000/month.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should send their resumes to apprenticeship@technopark.in with “Application for Technician Apprentice – Control Room” as the subject. Attach scanned copies of your certificates along with your resume. The last date to apply is 08.09.2025.

Note: Vacancies are subject to change without assigning any reason. Technopark reserves the right to change, modify, add, or cancel the recruitment process if required.

Contact Information:

Electronics Technology Parks Kerala (Technopark) Park Centre, Technopark Campus, Trivandrum, 695581 https://technopark.in
summary: Technopark is offering paid apprenticeships for talented graduates to gain hands-on experience in Electronics and Communication. Responsibilities include CCTV monitoring and maintenance within the Technopark campus.

job_description:
Angular Developer

FAYA INNOVATIONS is seeking an Angular Developer to be responsible for the client side of our service. The primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance. You will be creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app. The artistic design will be delivered to you, together with a few HTML templates, but we will ask for your help in regard to animations, CSS, and final HTML output. You will work in a team with the back-end developer and communicate with the API using standard methods. A thorough understanding of all of the components of our platform and infrastructure is required.

Responsibilities:

  • Delivering a complete front-end application.
  • Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop.
  • Writing tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Coordinating the workflow between the graphic designer, the HTML coder, and yourself.
  • Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API.
  • Communicating with external web services.

Qualifications and Requirements:

  • Proficiency with JavaScript, Typescript, and HTML5.
  • Professional, precise communication skills.
  • Deep knowledge of Angular practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience.
  • Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components.
  • Ensuring a clear dependency chain, in regard to the app logic as well as the file system.
  • Ability to provide SEO solutions for single-page apps.
  • Validating user actions on the client-side and providing responsive feedback
  • Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed.
  • Creating custom, general use modules, and components that extend the elements and modules of the core Angular app.
  • Experience with building the infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets.
  • Architecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scripts.
  • Creating e2e test suites for all components, and running them with Protractor (or a well-reasoned alternative).
  • Overall, 1-4 Years of experience in Angular alone is a must.

Additional Information:

  • Autonomy & Impact – Own your work, drive innovation, and see your solutions in action.
  • Growth & Mentorship – Be part of an elite team that values continuous learning.
  • Stability & Culture – A performance-driven, transparent, and innovation-friendly environment.
  • Health Benefits – Family medical insurance with up to ₹2L coverage.
  • Brilliance deserves to be well compensated.

Location: Technopark phase I, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala 695581 Working: 5 days a week.

Contact Information:

  • Email: hr.india@fayausa.com
  • Website: http://www.fayausa.com

Closing Date: 17, Oct 2025 Job Published: 02, Sept 2025
summary: Faya Innovations is looking for an Angular Developer to implement a complete user interface for mobile and desktop web applications. The role involves creating modules and components while ensuring high performance.

job_description:
Business Analyst

ARS Traffic & Transport Technology India (P) Ltd

131-135, First Floor, Nila Building Technopark Campus Thiruvananthapuram, 695581 http://www.ars-traffic.com

Contact Email: ankitac@arstraffic.com

Location: Trivandrum

Job Type: Full-time

Experience Level: 4+ Years

Closing Date: 12, Oct 2025

Job Published: 02, Sept 2025

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will bridge the gap between business needs and technology solutions, using data-driven insights to identify problems, propose solutions, and drive strategic decision-making.

Job Description:

  • Exhibited good requirement gathering and analytical skills to understand complex project requirements and further documenting those as Use Cases, SRS, BRD etc.
  • Collaborate with business, product, and technology teams to develop the software solutions required by the clients.
  • Excellent communication and inter-personal skills with good verbal and written English language proficiency.
  • Should have worked extensively with international clients.
  • Deep dive and acquire an extensive knowledge of emerging industry practices and apply when solving business problems.
  • Understand RFP requirements and provide optimum business solutions.
  • Knowledge of development life cycle, concepts and practices, draft proposal responses.
  • Preferred to have a technical background, but not mandatory.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business objectives, processes, and requirements.
  • Gather, document, and analyze functional and non-functional requirements.
  • Translate business needs into clear specifications for technical teams.
  • Conduct data analysis and interpret trends to support business decisions.
  • Facilitate workshops, meetings, and presentations to communicate insights and recommendations.
  • Create user stories, process flows, and wireframes as needed.
  • Support project management teams in scope definition, risk analysis, and solution evaluation.
  • Ensure solutions meet business needs and requirements through rigorous testing and validation.
  • Assist in the development of training materials and user documentation.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
  • Certification in Business Analysis (e.g., CBAP, CCBA, PMI-PBA) is a plus.

Skills and Abilities:

  • Strong leadership and team management skills with a focus on traffic management requirements.
  • Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills with traffic management authorities and internal teams.
summary: Seeking a Business Analyst to bridge business needs and tech solutions, using data-driven insights for strategic decisions. Responsibilities include requirement gathering, data analysis, and translating needs for tech teams.
